byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: VICHY, France, July 31--A feeling of isolation from the outside world persists here, making the situation seem even more unreal. There are newspapers, of course-- quite a number--but they are single sheets with little news from abroad, especially ...

headline.main: NEWS SCANT IN FRANCE; Vagueness of the Censored Press Stirs Curiosity About U.S.

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, July 31--A feeling of isolation from the outside world persists here, making the situation seem even more unreal. There are newspapers, of course-- quite a number--but they are single sheets with little news from abroad, especially from America.
